definition: a strip of material attached to the leg of a bird to identify it (as in studies of bird migration), get or try to get into communication (with someone) by telephone
details:
noun
- a strip of material attached to the leg of a bird to identify it (as in studies of bird migration)
= synonyms: band
- a rigid circular band of metal or wood or other material used for holding or fastening or hanging or pulling
= synonyms: hoop
- jewelry consisting of a circlet of precious metal worn on the finger and often set with jewels
= example: jewelry consisting of a circlet of precious metal worn on the finger and often set with jewels
= synonyms: band
- a platform usually marked off by ropes in which contestants box or wrestle
- a characteristic sound
= example: a characteristic sound
- the sound of a bell ringing
= example: the sound of a bell ringing
= synonyms: ringing, tintinnabulation
- an association of criminals
= synonyms: gang, pack, mob
- (chemistry) a chain of atoms in a molecule that forms a closed loop
= synonyms: closed chain
- a toroidal shape
= example: a toroidal shape
= synonyms: halo, annulus, anchor ring
verb
- get or try to get into communication (with someone) by telephone
= synonyms: call
- attach a ring to the foot of, in order to identify
= example: attach a ring to the foot of, in order to identify
= synonyms: band
- extend on all sides of simultaneously
= synonyms: border, skirt, surround, environ
- sound loudly and sonorously
= synonyms: peal
- make (bells) ring, often for the purposes of musical edification
= synonyms: knell
- ring or echo with sound
= synonyms: echo
